I feel terrible as well, I was the other owner, well the creator. As long a=
s NBM is in capable hands I am happy.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fro=
m: Soulstice Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, Februar=
y 01, 2001 4:47 PM
  Subject: Re: Minime3:16


  OOC: I wish I could say so=
mething, but I'm struggling not to cry upon my departed friend's wishes. I'=
ll take this day of silence as well, I can't understand why anyone wouldn't=
. Minime was once the co-owner of Neo Beast Machines RPG, and once the owne=
r left, he was granted the whole thing. Before he left, he GAVE me Neo Beas=
t Machines, the whole RPG, as well as his character Gotron. I promised neve=
r to let go of Gotron and to keep him forever. But I feel guilty I never pu=
mped Gotron up to a main player. So when the storyline comes to me, expect =
to see alot more Gotron. That's all I can say right now, I'm trying to keep=
 from crying. So I end this with goodbye, minime, Frank Reinhart, Michael S=
mith. Rest assured I won't forget you...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
=
    From: kinger01030@... 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Thu=
rsday, February 01, 2001 4:07 PM
    Subject: Minime3:16


    I am greatly=
 sad over the happening of minime. He was a great frined and a 
    great r=
ole player. His brother emailed me and a few others priatly. Minime 
    sa=
id that we kept him going. If not for this rpg that he would have done this=
 
    a long time ago. I hope that makes you proud to be apart of soemthing=
 that 
    could give a person like minime hope. I have given the idea to y=
anshosh to 
    make a day of silence in memory of Minime through out the r=
pg for one day. If 
    some dont agree with this thats fine. But me and da=
chande have agreed to do 
    this ourselves no matter what. The date will =
be set for our day of silence   
    some time soon. 

          Yahoo! Gro=
ups Sponsor 
             
                      www.  
               
   =
